results.t: Difference between SSR, SSG, CSR and SPA - nextjs
results.p: Next.js will dynamically and incrementally generate static pages, so I think for a blog SSG is the best option. Going static is actually always the best.

results.t: What are CSR, SSR, SSG, and ISR?
results.p: Static Site Generation (SSG) pre-renders all pages at build time for fast loads, while Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR) updates static content dynamically.
